title: Such amenity shall be deducted from the plot for the calculation of FSI permissible on the balance plot
clause_text: Such amenity shall be deducted from the plot for the calculation of FSI permissible on the balance plot.
section: In Plots/lay-outs of the land admeasuring 4000 sq. m or more:

source_pdf.text_snippet: Such amenity shall be deducted from the plot for the calculation of FSI permissible on the balance plot.
